title: The merry hoastess: or, A pretty new ditty, compos'd by an hoastess that lives in the city: to wrong such an hoastess it were a great pitty, by reason she caused this pretty new ditty. To the tune of, Buff coat has no fellow.
author: Robins, Thomas, fl. 1672-1685.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for John Andrews, at the White Lion near Pye-Corner.,
